sqlMap.select: SELECT CASE A.CampaignType WHEN 'DHHD' THEN 'PB' ELSE 'SP' END AS tradeType, A.CampaignCode AS campCode, A.NeedBuyFlag AS needBuyFlag, A.CampaignOrderFromDate AS orderFromDate, A.CampaignOrderToDate AS orderToDate, A.StockFromDate AS stockFromDate, A.StockToDate AS stockToDate, A.ObtainFromDate AS obtainFromDate, A.ObtainToDate AS obtainToDate, A.ObtainRule AS obtainRule, B.SubCampaignCode AS subCampCode, B.SubCampaignType AS subCampType, B.IsCollectInfo AS isCollectInfo, B.SubCampaignValid AS subCampaignValid, B.LocalValidRule AS localValidRule, B.Times AS times, B.TopLimit AS topLimit, B.State AS actState, A.GotCounter AS gotCounter, A.ExPointDeductFlag AS exPointDeductFlag, B.PriceControl AS priceControl, B.SaleBatchNo AS saleBatchNo, A.ManageGift AS manageGift FROM Campaign.BIN_Campaign A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignID = B.BIN_CampaignID) WHERE B.SubCampaignCode = #subCampCode#

SELECT C.BasePropValue1 AS searchCode, C.ActLocationType AS campMebType, B.CampaignSetBy AS userId, ISNULL(F.ExPoint,0) AS exPoint, G.ConditionInfo AS conInfo FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_Campaign B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignID = B.BIN_CampaignID) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = C.BIN_CampaignRuleID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignBaseProp D WITH(NOLOCK) ON(C.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = D.BIN_CampaignBasePropID AND D.PropertyName = 'baseProp_customer' AND D.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult E WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct F WITH(NOLOCK) ON(E.UnitCode = F.UnitCode AND F.PromotionCateCD = 'DHCP') ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = E.BIN_CampaignRuleID AND E.SaleType = 'P' AND E.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_SearchLog G WITH(NOLOCK) ON(C.BasePropValue1 = G.BIN_SearchCode) WHERE A.SubCampaignCode = #subCampCode#
sqlMap.sql: FROM Members.BIN_CustomerInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CustomerCode = B.MemCode) LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberInfo C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_MemberInfoID = C.BIN_MemberInfoID AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = C.BIN_BrandInfoID) LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberExtInfo D WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_MemberInfoID = D.BIN_MemberInfoID) WHERE A.BIN_SearchCode = #searchCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.Mobilephone AS mobilePhone, A.Telephone AS telephone, isnull(A.CounterCode,C.CounterCodeBelong) AS counterCode, A.BIN_CustomerCode AS memCode, A.Email AS email, SUBSTRING(A.Birthday,5,2) AS birthMonth, SUBSTRING(A.Birthday,7,2) AS birthDay, B.BIN_MemberInfoID AS memId, CONVERT(varchar(10),C.LevelAdjustDay,120) AS levelAdjustDay, CONVERT(varchar(10),C.JoinDate,120) AS joinDate, D.FirstSaleCounterCode AS firstSaleCounterCode, CONVERT(varchar(30),D.FirstSaleDate,120) AS firstSaleDate

SELECT DISTINCT OrgCode AS orgCode ,BrandCode AS brandCode ,BIN_MemberInfoID AS memId ,CampaignCode AS campCode ,MainCode AS subCampCode ,TradeNoIF AS billNo ,TradeType AS tradeType ,BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId ,InformType AS informType FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignHistory WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE TradeNoIF = #billNo#
BrandCode = #brandCode#

SELECT BIN_CampaignOrderID AS campOrderId, TradeNoIF AS billNo FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CampaignCode = #campCode# AND SendFlag = '3' AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND DataChannel = #dataChannel#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder SET SendFlag = '0' WHERE CampaignCode = #campCode# AND SendFlag = '3' AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND DataChannel = #dataChannel#

UPDATE Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder SET SendFlag = CASE SendFlag WHEN '1' THEN '2' ELSE SendFlag END, State = #state#, MqWaitFlag = CASE WHEN #state# = 'CA' AND MqWaitFlag = '0' THEN '1' WHEN #state# = 'CA' and MqWaitFlag = '1' THEN '0' ELSE MqWaitFlag END, CancelTime = CASE #state# WHEN 'CA' THEN #optTime# ELSE NULL END,
WHERE TradeNoIF = #billNo# AND State != 'OK'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.TradeNoIF AS billNo, A.State AS state, A.MemCode AS memCode, A.PointRequired AS sumPoint, A.OrderCounterCode AS orderCntCode, CONVERT(VARCHAR,A.CampaignOrderTime,120) AS orderTime, B.BIN_MemberInfoID AS memId, A.BIN_MemberClubID AS memberClubId, A.ClubCode AS clubCode
FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.MemCode = B.MemCode) WHERE
A.TradeNoIF = #billNo#
A.CampaignCode=#campCode#
A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
AND A.SubType = 'PX' AND MqWaitFlag = '1' AND A.ValidFlag='1'

SELECT UnitCode AS Unitcode, BarCode AS Barcode, GiftType AS DetailType, CONVERT(varchar,Quantity) AS Quantity, CONVERT(varchar,ISNULL(Amout,0)) AS Amount, MainCode AS ActivityMainCode FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_CampaignOrderID = #campOrderId# AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT A.BIN_CampaignOrderID AS campOrderId, A.TradeNoIF AS billNo, A.DataChannel AS dataChannel, A.ModifyCount AS modifyCount, A.OrderCounterCode AS orderCntCode, A.TradeType AS tradeType, A.SubType AS subType, A.CampaignCode AS campaignCode, A.CouponCode AS couponCode, CONVERT(Nvarchar, A.CampaignOrderTime, 23) AS orderDate, CONVERT(Nvarchar, A.CampaignOrderTime, 24) AS orderTime, CONVERT(Nvarchar, A.GetFromTime, 20) AS getFromTime, CONVERT(Nvarchar, A.GetToTime, 20) AS getToTime, A.PointRequired AS sumExPoint, A.State AS state, A.MemCode AS memCode, A.Mobile AS mobile, A.Telephone AS telephone, A.MessageId AS msgId, A.CounterGot AS cntGot, A.IsStock AS isStock, A.PriceControl AS priceControl, A.SaleBatchNo AS saleBatchNo, A.NeedBuyFlag AS needBuyFlag, A.SubCampaignValid AS subCampValid, A.Name AS name, A.Quantity AS quantity, A.Amout AS amout, A.BIN_MemberClubID AS memberClubId, A.ClubCode AS clubCode, A.DeliveryState AS deliveryState, ISNULL(A.DeliveryMothod,'2') AS deliveryType, A.DeliveryAddress AS deliveryAddress, A.RelationNo, A.ReceiverName, A.ReceiverMobile, A.DeliveryProvince, A.DeliveryCity, A.DeliveryCounty FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(NOLOCK)
JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignHistory B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.TradeNoIF = B.TradeNoIF AND B.BatchNo = #batchNo#)
A.TradeNoIF = #billNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder SET MqWaitFlag = '0' WHERE TradeNoIF = #billNo#
UPDATE Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder SET SendFlag = '1' WHERE TradeNoIF = #billNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.BIN_CampaignOrderID) FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignOrderID = B.BIN_CampaignOrderID AND B.MainCode = #subCampCode# AND B.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
A.MemCode = #memCode#
A.MessageId = #messageId#
A.Mobile = #mobilePhone#
A.OptYear = #optYear#
A.OptMonth = #optMonth#
A.OptDay = #optDay#
A.BookDate = #bookDate#
AND A.State != 'CA' AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT C.BIN_ProductVendorID AS proId, C.SaleType AS prtType, C.UnitCode AS unitCode, C.BarCode AS barCode, C.Quantity AS quantity, E.PromotionCateCD AS prmCateCode, CASE WHEN E.PromotionCateCD IN('TZZK','DHCP','DHMY') THEN ISNULL(C.Price,0) * -1 ELSE ISNULL(C.Price,0) END AS price, #subCampCode# AS subCampCode FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_Campaign B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignID = B.BIN_CampaignID) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = C.BIN_CampaignRuleID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor D WITH(NOLOCK) ON(C.BIN_ProductVendorID=D.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID AND C.SaleType = 'P') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (D.BIN_PromotionProductID=E.BIN_PromotionProductID) WHERE A.SubCampaignCode = #subCampCode# AND B.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
